abstract: Migrating files from a Windows Me computer to the Windows 7 environment is not easy — but not impossible either.
snippet: Migrating files from a Windows Me computer to the Windows 7 environment is not easy — but not impossible either.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a Windows Me machine and I am going to purchase a Windows 7 computer next month. A friend told me that I would not be able to transfer my documents and files from Windows Me to Windows 7. If this is true, is there any way to make this transfer?
